Test Piece Contest
Il Seraglio [arr. Godfrey Jnr]
People's Park, Ashington, Northumberland, England, UK Choice of test pieces: "Il Seraglio", "Rustic Scenes" or "Scottish Memories" Prizes: £12, £5, £3, £1 10s March: 1. Hebburn, 2. Heworth 4 bands competed.
Aug. 24, 2013, 6:55 p.m. Aug. 19, 2018, 12:21 p.m.
1 Hebburn Colliery J. Richardson

3 Linton Colliery William Heap
4 Ashington Duke Tom Hardy
